content: 2021 Singaporean film ***24*** is a 2021 Singaporean [art house](/wiki/Art_house) film directed by [Royston Tan](/wiki/Royston_Tan), starring James Choong. ## Cast - James Choong as the sound engineer - Xiao Li Yuan as Zhang Xiao Wu - [Royston Tan](/wiki/Royston_Tan) as himself ## Release The film premiered at the [Busan International Film Festival](/wiki/Busan_International_Film_Festival) on 10 October 2021. ## Reception John Berra of *[Screen Daily](/wiki/Screen_Daily)* wrote that the film "is utterly delightful on a scene-by-scene basis as characters are vividly sketched through glimpses of life, work, and artistic pursuits." Morris Yang of the *[International Cinephile Society](/wiki/International_Cinephile_Society)* rated the film 4 stars out of 5, writing that the film "is filled with the graceful celebration of life precisely by representing it through the spaces it evokes, common or unique, sanctioned or underground". - *24* at [IMDb](/wiki/IMDb_(identifier)) - *24* at [Rotten Tomatoes](/wiki/Rotten_Tomatoes) This article related to a Singaporean film is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: 24 (2021 film)
